text:
August 9# I960
tfaurica:
It now appears that Bill Barley mil, at
least for a year, take over as President.
If all goes well he will open a small
office hy September 1 in Washington, for
himself and a secretary — leaving the
rest of the staff in Urbena.
She transfer of the Network to the Center
looks increasingly more likely — though it
wont* be decided until October at San
Francisco. Hope we*11 see you there.
Sincerely,
BLCC: Mr. Harold Hill
HJSiJl Mr. William Harley
President
